name: Praise Be
description:
This is one of my first game projects. I created a prototype for an incremental game in which the player is a god and trying to gain power through followers and prayers. The game features a moral pull between good and evil. While this project isn't the best I still like to look back at this project to see how far I've come in designing games.

How To Play:

Click the hands in the middle to gain prayers.

Click on the upgrades to gain things like (More prayers per click with lightning, or followers over time with churches).

Some upgrades like sacrifice, require both prayers and followers.

Occasionally a choice will pop up, depending on the choice, morality will change, and upgrades may increase.

Since I didn't build the credits into the game, here they are.
